name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Curtis THOMAS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Curtis THOMAS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Neil E. Jokelson, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mark S. Gurevitz, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1010
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Curtis THOMAS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Neil E. Jokelson, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mark S. Gurevitz, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
